civilopediaText.text: This unit is the base mage. Can manipulate natural elements for attacks.
This unit has double existence allowing to cross cast distances in a single turn.

name: Terraformer
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Forest] tile <by consuming this unit>

civilopediaText.text: Perform terraformation. This unit can grow forest in a  tile that can have forests.

name: Rock Golem
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Hill] tile <by consuming this unit>

civilopediaText.text: Perform terraformation. This unit can shift the ground to rise a hill in a  tile that can have hills.

name: Ice Golem
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Ice] tile <by consuming this unit>
[This Unit] heals [6] HP <upon ending a turn in a [Ice] tile>
[This Unit] heals [3] HP <upon ending a turn in a [Snow] tile>
[This Unit] is destroyed <upon ending a turn in a [Desert] tile>

civilopediaText.text: Perform terraformation. This unit can freeze a lake or ocean tile to Ice tile. This unit dies if it stays on a desert tile.
A constant growing plant creature. Can heal it's full health in one turn. To destroy one must kill it with a single strike. Can poison it's target by 2 damage every turn.

name: Illusionist
uniques: [This Unit] gains [2] movement <upon damaging a [Target Unit] unit> <[3] times>

civilopediaText.text: Can disable moves of target unit by two turns using illusionary spells.

name: Pomologist
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Banana] tile <by consuming this unit>

civilopediaText.text: A specialized civilian unit that can establish banana plantations. When used, the Fruit Farmer will plant a banana seed and is consumed in the process.

name: End Orb
uniques: [Target Unit] is destroyed <upon damaging a [Target] unit> <after which this unit is consumed>
